tool_description: Get standardized balance sheet, income statement, and cash flow statement for global companies going back 5 years.
name: Financial Statements
title: Financial Statements

api_list.name: Balance Sheet Statement
api_list.description:
Get company balance sheet statement by year.

All numbers in thousands.

api_list.name: Cash Flow Statement
api_list.description:
Get company cash flow statement by year (ttm = Trailing Twelve Months).

All numbers in thousands.

api_list.name: Income Statement
api_list.description:
Get company income statement by year (ttm = Trailing Twelve Months).

All numbers in thousands.
